channel.title: CVE Feed for Micro Focus -- IDOL
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Micro Focus -- IDOL

item.title: CVE-2020-25833|2024-08-04T15:40:37.054Z -- micro%20focus -- idol
item.description: Persistent cross-Site Scripting vulnerability on Micro Focus IDOL product, affecting all version prior to version 12.7. The vulnerability could be exploited to perform Persistent XSS attack.
